summaries.title: Kendrick Lamar, Donald Trump, and celebs wey show for Super Bowl
summaries.description: Oda stars wey show for New Orleans include Jay-Z, Blue Ivy, Samuel L Jackson and Bradley Cooper.
summaries.imageAlt: Kendrick Lamar perform for Super Bowl

summaries.title: Judge block Trump plan to put thousands of USAID staff on leave
summaries.description: One last-minute court case mean say Trump efforts to dismantle di overseas development agency dey on hold.
summaries.imageAlt: Pipo hold protest signs in black, blue and red, wey read: 'Save USAID, save lives' and 'USAID must dey saved'

summaries.title: Who get Gaza?
summaries.description: President Donald Trump proposal say US go take control of Gaza and redevelop am into "Riviera of Middle East" don spark reactions.
summaries.imageAlt: Palestinians returning to northern Gaza, continue to live inside tents wey dem build on rubble of dia house

summaries.title: Trump latest executive order target di International Criminal Court wey e call 'illegitimate'
summaries.description: Di Hague-based body don create "shameful moral equivalency" between Hamas and Israel, di White House tok.
summaries.imageAlt: Donald Trump in the Oval Office.

summaries.title: Fear of deportation hit African migrants as Trump kontinu to raid immigrants
summaries.description: As Trump increase raids to detect and deport illegal migrants, di African community for America dey on edge, as dem fear say dem fit dey targeted.
summaries.imageAlt: Two heavily armed federal law enforcement officers stand during one enhanced immigration enforcement operation.

summaries.title: Di relocation of Gazans go be temporary, Rubio tok
summaries.description: UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres tok say Gaza na big part of di future of Palestinian state, e tok am for one meeting in New York di rights of Palestinians to live as human beings in dia own land dey slip comot from dia hand.
summaries.imageAlt: Aerial view of buildings destroyed by Israeli air strikes in Jabalia camp for Palestinian refugees in Gaza City This picture taken on 11 October 2023

summaries.title: 'More dan 1000 direct jobs on di line' - How Trump freeze order on foreign aid don dey affect Nigeria
summaries.description: President Trump executive order wey freeze foreign aid for 90 days don put several health interventions programs for Nigeria for serious palava.
summaries.imageAlt: Woman wearing USAID-branded hijab on a hospital bed with two health workers

summaries.title: South Africa president call Musk to calm Trump down on di land mata
summaries.description: President Trump, wey dey take advise from Elon Musk, bin threaten to cut funding to South Africa sake of dia land policy.
summaries.imageAlt: Elon Musk and Cyril Ramaphosa stand next to each oda  dey look camera.

summaries.title: Simple explanation of Trump tariffs plan as China do dia own back
summaries.description: China don announce one do-me-I-do you - retaliatory tariffs on some American goods, as US tariffs on all Chinese goods come into force.
summaries.imageAlt: Trump and Xi

summaries.title: Wetin be USAID and why Donald Trump wan end am?
summaries.description: Di US aid agency dey spend billions around di world on humanitarian support - but dia future dey in doubt.
summaries.imageAlt: One boy hold a toy car in front of one USAID sign

summaries.title: Trump threaten South Africa to cut funding over land policy
summaries.description: For 2018, Trump bin also give order to investigate wetin e call "by force land seizure" for South Africa.
summaries.imageAlt: Foto of South African President Cyril Ramaphosa and United States America President Donald Trump

summaries.title: Laken Riley Act: Trump don sign im administration first law
summaries.description: Di Laken Riley Act na law to increase di federal goment mandate to detain immigrants wey enta di kontri illegally.
summaries.imageAlt: Donald Trump afta e sign di Laken Riley Act into law

summaries.title: Di documents you need to stay legally for US as Trump mass deportation begin
summaries.description: Since President Donald Trump take ova office on 20 January, immigration enforcement operations don start across major US cities.
summaries.imageAlt: Migrants dey stranded for Mexico, outside di facilities of di Mexican Commission for Refugee Assistance for di State of Mexico

summaries.title: Six big immigration changes under Trump - and dia impact so far
summaries.description: Di ogbonge changes dey affect thousands of migrants, but how dem compare to past policies?
summaries.imageAlt: A group of people walk towards the camera, with their faces partially covered. They are walking past a large orange barrier

summaries.title: Wetin Trump 'two genders' policy mean for di world?
summaries.description: Campaigners are worried President Trump’s order on diversity and LGBT rights could threaten their work in other countries, but conservative groups welcome it.
summaries.imageAlt: President Trump holding a pen poised over a document. He sits on the wooden Resolute desk at the Oval Office of the US White House. He is looking down. He wears a navy suit, a purple tie. A US flag badge is pinned on him.

summaries.title: Latest on Trump plan to end US birthright citizenship after one judge block am
summaries.description: During di hearing, Judge John Coughenour call Trump citizenship order "clearly unconstitutional".
summaries.imageAlt: Donald Trump signs documents in the Oval Office

summaries.title: Settle now and stop dis unreasonable war or face new sanctions - Trump tell Putin
summaries.description: US president say im dey offer Moscow "big favour" by helping Russia and Ukraine reach a deal.
summaries.imageAlt: Donald Trump on di left hand side and Vladimir Putin on di right.

summaries.title: Wetin US exit from WHO mean for di world?
summaries.description: Global health sabi pipo warn say a withdrawal risk weakening di world defence against infectious diseases.
summaries.imageAlt: US President Donald Trump dey sign documents as e issue executive orders and pardons for di Oval Office for White House on Inauguration Day for Washington

summaries.title: Trump reply Bishop wey tell am to 'have mercy' on LGBT pipo and migrants – who be di Bishop?
summaries.description: Di Episcopal bishop of Washington bin call on President Trump to "have mercy" on LGBTQ+ and migrant communities for one inaugural prayer service sermon in Washington.
summaries.imageAlt: Bishop Mariann Edgar Budde wit US President Donald Trump during di National Prayer Service for Washington National Cathedral on 21 January 2025

summaries.title: Wetin be Executive Orders?
summaries.description: Executive order na order wey di president put in writing give to di federal goment, wey no require approval from congress.
summaries.imageAlt: US President Donald Trump display one of five executive orders for 2017

summaries.title: Why Nigerian pastors go Washington to attend Trump inauguration
summaries.description: Who be Nathaniel Bassey and William F. Kumuyi and why dem dey involved for di inauguration of Donald Trump?
summaries.imageAlt: Pastor William Kumuyi and Nathaniel Bassey

summaries.title: Musk respond to gbas-gbos ova Nazi salute gesture for Trump rally
summaries.description: Di billionaire say im critics "need beta dirty tricks" afta one gesture wey dey similar to Nazi salute.
summaries.imageAlt: Musk gestures with one arm outstretched inside the Capital One arena in Washington on the inauguration day of Donald Trump

summaries.title: Which executive orders Trump sign on day one?
summaries.description: Di republican quickly go about using im new powers to approve executive actions on some policy priorities.
summaries.imageAlt: Donald Trump is sworn in as the 47th president of the United States by Chief Justice John Roberts as Melania Trump holds the Bible in the US Capitol Rotunda in Washington, DC

summaries.title: President Donald Trump inauguration in fotos
summaries.description: Dis na di first time since di 1890s wey US president wey dem bin defeat for election dey return victorious to take oath for a second time.
summaries.imageAlt: Donald Trump
